headline: How I Kicked My Drinking Problem
abstract: Alcohol was my stress reducer, my reality fighter, the conferrer of artificial joys. It was also wreaking havoc on my life.
lead_paragraph: One day in the fall of 2018, I woke up feeling wrecked. The night before I’d had beers with colleagues and wound up braying loudly to one of them about something she’d confided and what I thought she should do.
keywords: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (Book)
